pages.text: Sometimes it can be inconvenient to travel long distances by foot, especially if you've been somewhere before.
Waystones, once crafted and placed in the world, are beacons to which you can instantly travel.  Once you attune to a waystone, irregardless of who crafted it, it is added to your network.

Not just a component in the creation of a waystone, Warp Stones can be used to quickly return to any waystone to which you have attuned.$(br2)There's just one catch: it can only be used once every$(br)   twenty minutes.
If you're in a bit more of a hurry, a return scroll can be used to instantly return to the last waystone to which you've attuned.$(br2)One-use item
An alternate version of the Return Scroll, the Bound Scroll will instead return you to the waystone to which its bound.$(br2) $(br)One-use item
Like the Warp Stone, the Warp Scroll will instantly return to you to any waystone to which you have attuned.$(br2) $(br)One-use item
